article_title: Jon Stewart Dresses Up As Miley In (Terrifying) ‘Daily Show’ Comeback

article_metadata.description: After taking the summer off to direct a film, The Daily Show host Jon Stewart stormed back on Tuesday night with an opening skit that paid homage to Miley Cyrus' infamous VMA performance.

og.description: After taking summer off, 'Daily Show' host came back Tuesday night with a nod to Cyrus' VMA showstopper.
og.title: Jon Stewart Dresses Up As Miley In (Terrifying) 'Daily Show' Comeback
